stories.title: Mayor suggests Helsinki declare itself an English-language city

stories.text:
I'd like to work in the US, for that I need an H-1B visa. It seems tough to get one [1] and slightly easier if one did a master program there.

Does anyone know of a cheap university offering 1 year (online) master programs that guarantees being selected for the extra 20K H-1B visa lottery?

I'd probably be interested in AI or data science (since I already did CS and Game-design as master degrees in Europe).

[1] I applied over 100 US companies, only one responded back and gave me an onsite (pre-covid so I flew to SF). Unfortunately, I wasn't selected due to lack of experience back then.
stories.title: Ask HN: Cheap master programs for H-1B visa?

stories.text:
Hi HN folks,

Forgive me, but you won't find any answer to this "irrelevant" question in this linked paper, http://lambdaway.free.fr/lambdawalks/?view=iife, just an attempt to present in a few words the basics of coding, as they appear to me today, after having wandered among more familiar languages but full of grey areas. I'm looking for your opinion, kind if possible, so that I don't continue my quest alone.

Thank you in advance - alain marty
